Body: I upgraded Viber to 5.3 version last night. after that , I have vibrate on my phone when I receive new message on Viber. There is "Vibrate when ringing" in notification setting that it doesn't selectbefore upgrading I didn't have this problem.My phone is  Sony Xperia Z2 and Android 4.4.4How can i turn off vibrate on Viber messages notification?UPDATE:Viber support : Hello Mohammad,Thank you for contacting Viber support.We received numerous complaints about this problem and are currently investigating it. We will contact you back if we need more information. Thank you.UPDATE 2this problem solved in the new version
